Package oauthmodule.actions.custom

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorHandler
    HelperClass for displaying html pages from the resource directory when errors are encountered
    ExecuteHttpRequest
    HelperClass for execution of http requests
    GetAccessCodeFacebook
    HelperClass for retrieving a accesscode from Facebook Oauth
    GetAccessCodeGoogle
    HelperClass for retrieving a accesscode from Google Oauth
    GetAccessCodeLinkedin
    HelperClass for retrieving a accesscode from Linkedin Oauth
    GetAccessToken
    HelperSuperClass for retrieving a Accesstokens from Oauth providers Currently configured ootb are Google Linkedin Facebook
    GetAccessTokenFacebook
    HelperClass for retrieving a accesstoken from Facebook Oauth
    GetAccessTokenGoogle
    HelperClass for retrieving a accesstoken from Google Oauth
    GetAccessTokenLinkedin
    HelperClass for retrieving a accesstoken from Linkedin Oauth
    GetHttpRequest
    HelperClass for Get requests to Oauth Providers
    LoginHelper
    Helper class, which is used to create a Mendix Session, which avoids an additional round trip to the client.
    LogRecordHandler
    HelperClass for creating logrecords in the Mendix application
    OauthCallback
    Class handles the callback from the Oauth provider as the requesthandler
    OauthSigninMultiIdP
    This class will handle the request as a requesthandler by redirecting the user to the selected Oauth provider.
    PostHttpRequest
    This class performs post requests to the provided Url
